name: Universe Pandemic 2
description:
Can you conquer the universe with an alien made pathogen?

Create a pathogen and take over the Universe (including Earth) using your smarts as the commander of the Gaarg fleet.

Features:
- Beautiful realtime HD graphics with animations of alien ships, explosions, real time thunderstorms, hurricanes and much more.
- Alien competitors, battle other pathogens real time.
- Multiple planets with detailed maps (Earth has every country)
- Over 144+ different traits, abilities & actions.
- Challenging game modes.
- Auto save to cloud or locally linked with your Facebook account. (Optional)
- Star rating and detailed stats about each area.
- Countries interact with one another with migration, warfare, etc.
- Can unlock special traits and abilities (Like calling in the mothership to bombard the planet) with Soul gems or Gaia gems earned in game.

Coming soon
- Multiplayer with ranked 1v1, 2v2, 3v3 matches.
- Play with friends online in ranked matches.
- Scenario mode with friends up-to 4 players in a team all real time.

You can find out more on (Plus forums) at UniversePandemic.com
